path.description: Path to file on remote host.

password.description: The pasword for the user on the target host.

port.description: The ssh port to the target host.

private_key.description: The private key used to login to the target host.

private_key_path.description: The path of the private key used to login to the target host.

sudo.description: Use sudo to gain access to read/write file.

username.description: The username on the target host.

block.description: Connection to host where files are located.
